files.content:
"use client"

import { LifeBuoy, Send } from "lucide-react"

import {
  Sidebar,
  SidebarContent,
  SidebarGroup,
  SidebarGroupContent,
  SidebarGroupLabel,
  SidebarMenu,
  SidebarMenuButton,
  SidebarMenuItem,
  SidebarProvider,
} from "@/registry/new-york/ui/sidebar"

export default function AppSidebar() {
  return (
    <SidebarProvider>
      <Sidebar>
        <SidebarContent>
          <SidebarGroup>
            <SidebarGroupLabel>Help</SidebarGroupLabel>
            <SidebarGroupContent>
              <SidebarMenu>
                <SidebarMenuItem>
                  <SidebarMenuButton>
                    <LifeBuoy />
                    Support
                  </SidebarMenuButton>
                </SidebarMenuItem>
                <SidebarMenuItem>
                  <SidebarMenuButton>
                    <Send />
                    Feedback
                  </SidebarMenuButton>
                </SidebarMenuItem>
              </SidebarMenu>
            </SidebarGroupContent>
          </SidebarGroup>
        </SidebarContent>
      </Sidebar>
    </SidebarProvider>
  )
}
